cast.name: 吉姆·艾尔-哈利利 Jim Al-Khalili

this_title: The Beginning and End of the Universe
introduction: Professor Jim Al-Khalili takes us back in time to tackle the greatest question in science: how did the universe begin? Uncovering the origins of the universe is regarded as humankind's greatest intellectual achievement. By recreating key experiments Jim unravels the cosmic mystery of science's creation story before witnessing a moment, one millionth of a second, after the unive...
foreign_title: The Beginning and End of the Universe
